ygData.subject: Re: Stein - An update from EQCasters
ygData.msgSnippet: a friend of mine just brought this to my attention, something i hadnt thought of. if no one wants a nice item to get nerfed, dont post a spoiler on how to get
ygData.messageBody:
a friend of mine just brought this to my attention, something i hadnt
thought of.

if no one wants a nice item to get nerfed, dont post a spoiler on how to
get it. this item had been in game for a while, and only recently had it
been discovered and spoiled. now it's most likely gonna get nerfed.

lesson to be learned: dont post spoilers. they only lead to an influx of an
item into the world at unbelievably high rates, later to be nerfed or
removed...

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 29th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
Qoronita, 9th level Erudite Enchantress on Cazic-Thule
(let's see who reaches 30 first, heh)
-------------------
tim borrelli
computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
